studyMetadata.title: Randomized Full VLAT (Visualization Literacy Assessment Test)
studyMetadata.description: A replication of the VLAT questionnaire by Lee et al., TVCG 2016 (doi:10.1109/TVCG.2016.2598920) randomized between visualizations, using image stimuli.

uiConfig.studyEndMsg: Thank you for completing the study. You may click this link and return to Prolific: https://app.prolific.com/submissions/complete?cc=CE96X7ST

response.prompt: Please enter your prolificId
